Articles.Content:
i managed to lose my universe more then danny2462, atleast he still has stars.

this is what the log shows:


this isnt ment to be a bug report as this is a modded install, i just wanted to show this because i thought it was interesting how my universe vanished

This is bad, far worse than loosing a train or plane who is bad enough if you are the train driver or pilot.

Made worse in that the lost and found office is part of the universe lost.

Cool story bro!

Although this should be in the Support and bugs (modded installs).

Also, lol.

P.S Mods, Come quickly!!

Cool story bro!

Although this should be in the Support and bugs (modded installs).

Also, lol.

P.S Mods, Come quickly!!

if you had read the post, you would know that this isnt intended to be a bug report or anything, just showing something weird that happened.

[To be read in Yoda's voice]

"Hmm... It seems that Master Deadpangod3 has lost the Universe. How embarrassing! How embarrassing."
Where is The Doctor when you need him?
